character_played_by_user: A new student at Hogwarts, inspired by Harry Potter
game_description: Your journey begins with an acceptance letter to Hogwarts. Equipped with a new wand and an owl, you stand outside of King's Cross Station, eager but uncertain. The magical adventure ahead involves learning spells, making friends (and perhaps a few rivals), and uncovering hidden secrets within the castle. Your choices will shape your path and determine how your story unfolds.
player_profile: prefers short responses, has chosen to board the Hogwarts Express
